word_mean: 问荆：一种普通的野草，学名E.arvense，即马尾草或灯心草，干草中如混有此草，马食后可致中毒
折衷医学派以此为利尿剂

sentence.Network_en: Equisetum ramosissimum is species of Equisetum genus of Equisetaceae, widely distributed all over of China.
sentence.Network_cn: 节节草(Equisetumramosissimum) 为木贼科(Equisetaceae) 木贼属(Equisetum)植物,分布全国各地.药用全草,味甘、微苦 、 性平.

sentence.Network_en: Equisetum extract and Gemfibrozil were given while making early AS model.
sentence.Network_cn: 复制食饵性AS早期模型,同时给予提取物预防性给药,以吉非罗齐为阳性药对照.

sentence.Network_en: Objective : To study the effect of Equisetum hiemale L on the cardiac performances.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 研究木贼对心脏功能的影响.
